queries.query:
select * where { 
	?p dcterms:creator ?x, ?x1, ?x2 ;
		dcterms:type ?type ;
		dcterms:title ?label ;
		dcterms:issued ?date . 

	filter (?date >= "$beginYear-01-01"^^xsd:date)
	filter (?date <= "$endYear-12-31"^^xsd:date)
        
	?x hsc:person ?a .
	?a foaf:name "Frédéric Precioso" .
	?x hsc:structure ?s1 .
	?s1 org:unitOf ?inst .
	?inst skos:prefLabel "$lab1" .  

	?x1 hsc:person ?a1 .
	?a1 foaf:name ?s .

	?x2 hsc:person ?a2 .
	?a2 foaf:name ?o .
	filter(?x1 != ?x2)
}
